publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-2686 #Falkirk Are The Champions (lodged on 11 April 2005) Brian Adam*, Bill Butler*, David Mundell*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Eleanor Scott*, Rob Gibson*, Fergus Ewing*, Karen Gillon*, Michael Matheson*, Mike Pringle*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Christine May*, Margaret Mitchell*, Tommy Sheridan*, John Swinburne*, Mike Watson*, Michael McMahon*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2686 #Falkirk Are The Champions (lodged on 11 April 2005) Mr David Davidson*, Cathy Peattie*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2686 #Falkirk Are The Champions (lodged on 11 April 2005) Murray Tosh*, Fiona Hyslop*

S2M-2686 # Dennis Canavan: Falkirk Are The Championsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk Football Club on winning the First Division of the Scottish Football League and wishes the Bairns every success in the Scottish Premier League. Supported by: Brian Adam, Bill Butler, David Mundell, Mr Frank McAveety, Eleanor Scott, Rob Gibson, Fergus Ewing, Karen Gillon, Michael Matheson, Mike Pringle, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Christine May, Margaret Mitchell, Tommy Sheridan, John Swinburne, Mike Watson, Michael McMahon, Donald Gorrie, Mr David Davidson, Cathy Peattie, Rosie Kane, Murray Tosh, Fiona Hyslop
S2M-2686# Falkirk Are The Champions (lodged on 11 April 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
